title: How a Founder Can Step Down as CEO Yet Remain Pivotal in a New Role
description: Mission Wealth founder Seth Streeter ran his $4.8 billion AUM firm as CEO for more than 20 years. Now, still in his early 50s, he put his ego aside, gave up the reins, and is focusing on other company initiatives.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Mission Wealth founder Seth Streeter ran his $4.8 billion AUM firm as CEO for more than 20 years. Now, still in his early 50s, he put his ego aside, gave up the reins, and is focusing on other company initiatives.
